messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is Cultist A and B standing at the window with?
Cultist A and B stand at the window with Cultist C.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What has Cultist C done?
Cultist C has gone through the window and is now in the yard.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is out in front, in the alleyway, having scaled the fence already?
Brian is out in front, in the alleyway, having scaled the fence already.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is about to climb the fence?
Harvey (H) is about to climb the fence.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many movement actions does Harvey have?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many movement actions does Brian have?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many movement actions does Cultist C have?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the order of DEX in the characters?
Brian > Harvey > Cultists
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the significance of the Keeper's action in Round 1?
The Keeper has 'cut to the chase' as per page 133.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the Keeper's action affect the cultists?
The Keeper allows for one investigator to be trapped, abandoned by his friends.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What action is taken by Brian, the lead cultist?
Brian moves first, running 4 spaces up the alley.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is allowed by the Keeper for Brian's movement?
The Keeper allows for all four spaces to be open locations.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of a speed roll in this scenario?
These things are simply allowed to have occurred as a result of the speed roll.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of Harvey's Climb skill roll?
His Climb skill roll is a failure.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why does the Keeper not apply damage for failing to climb the fence?
the fact that cultists are about to attack him is sufficient.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What must Harvey do if he wants to cross the fence?
He must make another attempt next round.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when Harvey fails to climb the fence?
The Keeper does not apply any damage for failing to climb the fence—the fact that cultists are about to attack him is sufficient.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does Cultist C do to Harvey after the Keeper's turn?
Cultist C runs across to Harvey and spends a third movement action to attack him.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the current state of the Keeper's map?
window, fence, CultistA, CultistB, Harvey, Cultist C, Brian.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when Cultist C's fighting maneuver is attempted?
The cultist's build is 0, the same as Harvey's, so no bonus or penalty dice are awarded for the fighting maneuver.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if Harvey tries to climb over the fence again?
He must make another attempt next round.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many movement actions does Cultist C have left after his turn?
1 movement action left.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many movement actions does Cultist C use in his turn?
4 movement actions.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result of Harvey's attack roll?
A Failure.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Why did Cultist B not climb down from the window?
Cultist B took a reckless approach and jumped from the window rather than climbing.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the difficulty level of the climb roll for Cultist B?
The Keeper decided the difficulty level of the climb roll would be Regular, but raised it to Hard.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Did Cultist B succeed in his jump?
The Keeper rolled a failure for the cult.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can Cultist B initiate another attack this round?
No, the cultist cannot initiate another attack this round.
